assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en:
Containerisation technologies and orchestration solutions like Kubernetes are the cornerstone of building efficient microservice-based scalable and reliable applications.  
This course deals with the nature, design and development of container-based systems and cloud-native services. The knowledge acquired in the course is hardened through practical tasks and homeworks.
description.et:
Konteinertehnoloogiad ja orkestreerimise lahendused, nagu Kubernetes, on tõhusate mikroteenuse-põhiste skaleeritavate ja tõrkekindlate rakenduste loomise nurgakiviks.
See kursus käsitleb konteineripõhiste süsteemide ja pilvepõhiste teenuste olemust, disaini ja arendamist. Kursusel omandatud teadmisi kinnistatakse praktiliste ülesannete ja kodutööde kaudu.

objectives.en: To give students knowledge and understanding of the nature of containerization, container orchestration solutions and using them to design cloud-native systems. Provide hands-on experience in managing Kubernetes services, deployments and creating cloud-native applications.
objectives.et: Anda õpilastele teadmisi ja arusaamist konteineriseerimise olemusest, konteinerite orkestreerimise lahendustest ja nende kasutamisest pilvepõhiste süsteemide disainimisel. Anda praktilist kogemust Kubernetese teenuste haldamisel, teenuste juurutamisel ja pilvepõhiste rakenduste loomisel.

learning_outcomes.en: 1. how to build microservices for Kubernetes
learning_outcomes.et: 1. kuidas Kubernetese abil disinida mikroteenusepõhiseid rakendusi

learning_outcomes.en: 2. the architecture and building blocks of Kubernetes
3. how to configure, administer and deploy services
learning_outcomes.et: 3. kuidas teenuseid konfigureerida, administreerida ja juurutada

learning_outcomes.en: 4. how to test, scale and monitor microservice applications
learning_outcomes.et: 4. Kuidas testida, skaleerida ja monitoorida mikroteenuseid

learning_outcomes.en: 5. how to design reliable cloud-native applications
